## ğŸš€ Quick Install

```bash
pip install corby

# check your installation
corby -v
```

## ğŸ¤” What is this?

AI applications are awesome, but... who has time to go through all the settings, configurations and the hell of folder structuring? ğŸ˜«

**Corby** is a tool that bootstraps the skeleton of your AI applications so you don't have spend a ton of time preparing the configurations.

ğŸš€ Just run the command `corby` on your terminal and get your AI application working in less than 1 minute!

## ğŸ“š How to use

[ğŸ“Œ User guides can be found here ğŸ“Œ](docs)

```bash
usage: corby new {chatbot | notebook} [options]

positional arguments:
  {new}               Action to perform
  {chatbot,notebook}  Entity to work with

options:
  -h, --help          show this help message and exit
  -v, --version       Show version
  -d, --debug         Debug mode
```
